title: The Gold-Bug and Other Tales
description: Nine gripping tales of psychological terror and the supernatural, by the undisputed master of the American Gothic horror story: *Ligeia*The Fall of the House of Usher*The Murders in the Rue Morgue*The Masque of the Red Death*The Pit and the Pendulum*The Tell-Tale Heart*The Gold-Bug*The Black Cat*The Cask of Amontillado
author: Edgar Allan Poe
